message.body: Little wilderness made it through round 1. What the shit?!?
For which place ?
Sundance
Ah!! Congratulations!
Fingers crossed for round 2. They decide by mid December.
Thanks for all your help!!
I am so fucking excited for you!!
So so excited!!
I am so surprised. I'm trying to not get too excited lol
We must celebrate! You should be very excited and proud!
No matter what you know you wrote 10 amazing pages of script!
And they want to see more!
It worked!
I'm gonna come back on Tuesday night now but let's celebrate with a drink weds or Thursday or Friday!
Sounds good I will try to figure out a time! So exciting!! When do you need to get the next round to them?
You really made my day - it's so nice to hear good news
The 22nd. And a directing reel. I'm feeling good about the draft. Needs a lil work but it's solid. Got someone feedback about it so I'm gonna do some work up here.
Feel free to send me anything you want - if you need another pair of eyes.
What's good is that it is a workshop - do they give you any feedback?
Thank you! I'll see what I can get done before Tuesday.
I am so excited for you!!
Well think about what is strong in the first 10 and the try to keep it up! I feel so honored to have been part of it! It is always so so fun to work with you!
And this is such a good story!
I don't know that's a good question. I wonder how many people are in round 2. Might be a hundred, dunno.
Could NOT have done it without you.
Not even close
Heck yeah! I'll text you when I'm back! Have an awesome weekend
You too!! No matter what it is awesome / impressive you got invited to apply for round 2! So so excited for you
Thanks. It's super gratifying and exciting.
Also remind me to tell you about my session with cosmic Jackie!
